data.client_settings: Standard settings, tested with friends affects all desktop clients.
data.actual_result: You will get kicked from the call and get forced to rejoin.
data.expected_result: You see the persons profile details.
data.short_description: Discord makes you leave and rejoin call in a group chat when you click a name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a group chat - Click on a name in the group chat.
